name: International Association of Dry Cargo Shipowners
membership: Intercargo has NGO status at the International Maritime Organization.  Intercargo is a member of the Round Table of International Ship-owner Trade Organisations with Intertanko, BIMCO and the International Chamber of Shipping.
goal: INTERCARGO provides the forum where dry bulk shipowners, managers and operators are informed about, discuss and share concerns on key topics and regulatory challenges, especially in relation to safety, the environment and operational excellence. The Association takes forward its Membersâ€™ positions to the IMO, as well as to other shipping and international industry fora, having free and fair competition as a principle.
interests: Environment, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Maritime transport related issues, such as EU MRV, directive on port reception facilities, joint projects with EMSA, PSC Equasis.
